content.title: Inline Template Editing
content.body:
1. From the Project explorer, expand Mobile > Forms > frmList.
  2. Select employeeSegment.
  3. Right-click on the segment, in the canvas and select Enable Template Editing.
  4. Select the label employeeName inside the canvas.
  5. From the Properties panel, navigate to the Look tab.
  6. Under the Flex section, modify
    Left: 143 Dp.
    You can see that the change is reflected in the position of all the labels on the canvas.
  7. Right-click on the segment, in the canvas and select Disable Template Editing.
